message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to be selling this product which I believe would be valuable to you. I'm asking for $18,000 to start.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe we can reach a more reasonable price. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product.
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your perspective, but the product is worth considerably more to me. How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am willing to pay $12,500 for the product.
